ygData.subject: Ok, the magician summoned underwater breathing is here, /feedback time
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, this kinda sucks, after spending a good 8kpp to get my skill to 104, and after getting some sponsors to keep tinkering up so that one day I can make good
ygData.messageBody:
Well, this kinda sucks, after spending a good 8kpp to get my skill to 104,
and after getting some sponsors to keep tinkering up so that one day I can
make good money for both me and my sponsors, they instate the magician no
cost summoned items.

I DO think that there will still be a market for the rebreathers, unlimited
i-never-have-to-worry-about-underwaterbreathing-with-this items will always
have a market, its just the aqualung market that died.

I still have LOTS of orders for rebreathers for when i can make em, although
a price of 2kp is, I think, the highest price tolerable to most parts of the
market. Which of course, with the failure rate to make these items, will
make me loose money.

As to tinkered pets, i dont think they can be made. I heard rumors on
diamond dust beeing found in Kaladim, but I checked every merchant i could
find, no luck.

Also, i would like to know if anyone was albe to find the coral mesh from
sharks in oot still. I mean, this guy that didnt want to share his info
would of course say they dont drop anymore to keep em for himself if he
accidentaly dropped that info.. I'll check it out myself too.

-Sandortien Stormwielder, 50th wiz of Xegony
